attributes.action: Give motorcycles an exemption, for displaying parking permits, in Derbyshire.
attributes.background: Motorcycles have no way to securely displayed a parking ticket or permit. They also take up very little space. Most councils encourage their use.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local parking permits are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
